subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=yā,yà
|m_note=yà - only used in {{zh-l|*壓根}} (Mainland standard)
|c=aat3
|h=pfs=ap
|md=dáh/ák
|md_note=dáh - vernacular; ák - literary
|mn=ah/ap/qz,tw,xm:teh
|mn_note=ah - vernacular; ap - literary; teh - vernacular (俗), also written as {{zh-l|硩|tr=-}}
|mn-t=iab4/ieb4/dêh4
|mn-t_note=iab4/ieb4 - literary (ieb4 - Chaozhou); dêh4 - vernacular (俗), also written as {{zh-l|硩|tr=-}}
|w=4aq
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,n
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[press]] down on; to [[compress]]; to [[crush]]
# to [[oppress]]; to [[tyrannise]]
# {{lb|zh|physics}} [[pressure]]
